post0.title: COVID-19 growth analysis
post0.content: This visualization was made by Thomas Wiecki1. . . Data sourced from "2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 (2019-nCoV) Data Repository by Johns Hopkins CSSE" GitHub repository and recreates the (pay-walled) plot in the Financial Times. This code is provided under the BSD-3 License. Link to original notebook.↩ . |

page1.title: About
page1.content: This website is powered by fastpages, a blogging platform that natively supports Jupyter notebooks in addition to other formats. .
